外面下着雨:
The phrase '外面下着雨' (wài miàn xià zhe yǔ) means 'it is raining outside.'

Breakdown:
- 外面 (wài miàn): outside
- 外 (wài): outside, exterior
- 面 (miàn): surface, area
- 下着 (xià zhe): is raining (continuous state)
- 下 (xià): to fall, as in rain falling
- 着 (zhe): a particle indicating a continuous state
- 雨 (yǔ): rain
犹如我心血在滴:
The phrase '犹如我心血在滴' (yóu rú wǒ xīn xuè zài dī) means 'as if my heartfelt blood (effort) is dripping.'

Breakdown:
- 犹如 (yóu rú): like, just as
- 犹 (yóu): similar to
- 如 (rú): as if, like
- 我 (wǒ): I, my
- 心血 (xīn xuè): the blood of the heart (one's heartfelt effort)
- 心 (xīn): heart
- 血 (xuè): blood
- 在滴 (zài dī): is dripping
- 在 (zài): indicates continuous action
- 滴 (dī): drip, drop
爱你那么久:
The phrase '爱你那么久' (ài nǐ nà me jiǔ) means 'to love you for so long.'

Breakdown:
- 爱 (ài): love
- 你 (nǐ): you
- 那么 (nà me): so, that much
- 那 (nà): that
- 么 (me): particle for emphasis
- 久 (jiǔ): long (time)
其实算算不容易:
The phrase '其实算算不容易' (qí shí suàn suàn bù róng yì) means 'actually, when you really count it, it isn’t easy.'

Breakdown:
- 其实 (qí shí): actually
- 其 (qí): that
- 实 (shí): true, real
- 算算 (suàn suàn): to calculate or reckon (repetition adds a casual tone)
- 算 (suàn): to count, calculate
- 算 (suàn): repeated for emphasis
- 不容易 (bù róng yì): not easy
- 不 (bù): not
- 容易 (róng yì): easy
- 容 (róng): to allow, tolerate
- 易 (yì): simple, easy
就要分东西:
The phrase '就要分东西' (jiù yào fēn dōng xi) means 'we’re about to divide our things (or part ways by splitting belongings).'

Breakdown:
- 就要 (jiù yào): about to
- 就 (jiù): then, just
- 要 (yào): will, want
- 分东西 (fēn dōng xi): to divide things or belongings
- 分 (fēn): to divide, separate
- 东西 (dōng xi): things, belongings
- 东 (dōng): east
- 西 (xi): west
明天不再有关系:
The phrase '明天不再有关系' (míng tiān bù zài yǒu guān xì) means 'tomorrow there will no longer be any relationship (or connection).'

Breakdown:
- 明天 (míng tiān): tomorrow
- 明 (míng): bright, next
- 天 (tiān): day
- 不再 (bù zài): no longer
- 不 (bù): not
- 再 (zài): again
- 有关系 (yǒu guān xì): have a relationship/connection
- 有 (yǒu): to have
- 关系 (guān xì): relationship, connection
- 关 (guān): to relate, connection
- 系 (xì): tie, link
留在家里的衣服:
The phrase '留在家里的衣服' (liú zài jiā lǐ de yī fu) means 'the clothes left at home.'

Breakdown:
- 留在 (liú zài): to remain or be left at
- 留 (liú): to stay, leave behind
- 在 (zài): at, in
- 家里 (jiā lǐ): at home
- 家 (jiā): home, family
- 里 (lǐ): inside
- 的 (de): possessive/linking particle
- 衣服 (yī fu): clothes
- 衣 (yī): garment, clothes
- 服 (fu): attire
有空再来拿回去:
The phrase '有空再来拿回去' (yǒu kòng zài lái ná huí qù) means 'come back to pick it up when you have time.'

Breakdown:
- 有空 (yǒu kòng): to have free time
- 有 (yǒu): to have
- 空 (kòng): free time
- 再来 (zài lái): come again, later
- 再 (zài): again
- 来 (lái): come
- 拿回去 (ná huí qù): to take back, pick up and return
- 拿 (ná): to take
- 回去 (huí qù): to go back
- 回 (huí): return
- 去 (qù): go
不去想爱都结了果:
The phrase '不去想爱都结了果' (bù qù xiǎng ài dōu jié le guǒ) means 'don’t even think about it—the love has already reached its outcome (or come to an end).'

Breakdown:
- 不去想 (bù qù xiǎng): do not bother to think
- 不 (bù): not
- 去 (qù): to go (used here as a verbal complement)
- 想 (xiǎng): to think
- 爱 (ài): love
- 都 (dōu): all, already
- 结了果 (jié le guǒ): has produced a result (implying the end of love)
- 结 (jié): to form, bear fruit
- 了 (le): particle indicating change or completion
- 果 (guǒ): fruit, outcome
舍不得拼命找借口:
The phrase '舍不得拼命找借口' (shě bu dé pīn mìng zhǎo jiè kǒu) means 'unable to bear to desperately look for excuses.'

Breakdown:
- 舍不得 (shě bu dé): reluctant to part with or give up
- 舍 (shě): to give up
- 不 (bu): not
- 得 (dé): able to
- 拼命 (pīn mìng): desperately, with all one’s might
- 拼 (pīn): to strive, struggle
- 命 (mìng): life, fate
- 找 (zhǎo): to look for
- 借口 (jiè kǒu): excuse
- 借 (jiè): to borrow
- 口 (kǒu): mouth, opening (here used to mean an excuse)
不勉强你再为了我:
The phrase '不勉强你再为了我' (bù miǎn qiǎng nǐ zài wèi le wǒ) means 'I won’t force you to do it again for me.'

Breakdown:
- 不 (bù): not
- 勉强 (miǎn qiǎng): to force or compel
- 勉 (miǎn): to endeavor, try
- 强 (qiǎng): strong, force
- 你 (nǐ): you
- 再 (zài): again
- 为了 (wèi le): for the sake of
- 为 (wèi): for
- 了 (le): particle indicating completed action
- 我 (wǒ): me
心不在留不留都是痛:
The phrase '心不在留不留都是痛' (xīn bù zài liú bù liú dōu shì tòng) means 'whether your heart is in it or whether you stay or leave, it all hurts.'

Breakdown:
- 心 (xīn): heart
- 不在 (bù zài): is not present (implying lack of genuine feeling)
- 不 (bù): not
- 在 (zài): be present
- 留 (liú): to stay
- 不留 (bù liú): not to stay
- 不 (bù): not
- 留 (liú): remain
- 都 (dōu): all, regardless
- 是 (shì): is
- 痛 (tòng): pain, hurt
我可以抱你吗 爱人:
The phrase '我可以抱你吗 爱人' (wǒ kě yǐ bào nǐ ma ài rén) means 'Can I hold you, my love?'

Breakdown:
- 我 (wǒ): I
- 可以 (kě yǐ): can, may
- 可 (kě): can
- 以 (yǐ): be able to
- 抱 (bào): to hold or embrace
- 你 (nǐ): you
- 吗 (ma): question particle
- 爱人 (ài rén): lover, beloved
- 爱 (ài): love
- 人 (rén): person
让我在你肩膀哭泣:
The phrase '让我在你肩膀哭泣' (ràng wǒ zài nǐ jiān bǎng kū qì) means 'Let me cry on your shoulder.'

Breakdown:
- 让 (ràng): let, allow
- 我 (wǒ): me
- 在 (zài): on, at
- 你 (nǐ): your
- 肩膀 (jiān bǎng): shoulder
- 肩 (jiān): shoulder
- 膀 (bǎng): part of the shoulder/arm
- 哭泣 (kū qì): to cry, weep
- 哭 (kū): cry
- 泣 (qì): weep
如果今天我们就要分离:
The phrase '如果今天我们就要分离' (rú guǒ jīn tiān wǒ men jiù yào fēn lí) means 'If today we are going to part ways.'

Breakdown:
- 如果 (rú guǒ): if
- 如 (rú): like, as if
- 果 (guǒ): result, outcome
- 今天 (jīn tiān): today
- 今 (jīn): now, present
- 天 (tiān): day
- 我们 (wǒ men): we, us
- 我 (wǒ): I, me
- 们 (men): plural marker for people
- 就要 (jiù yào): are about to
- 就 (jiù): just, then
- 要 (yào): will, about to
- 分离 (fēn lí): to separate, part ways
- 分 (fēn): to separate
- 离 (lí): to leave, depart
让我痛快地哭出声音:
The phrase '让我痛快地哭出声音' (ràng wǒ tòng kuai de kū chū shēng yīn) means 'Let me cry out loud with relief.'

Breakdown:
- 让 (ràng): let, allow
- 我 (wǒ): me
- 痛快地 (tòng kuai de): heartily, with unrestrained emotion
- 痛快 (tòng kuai): free, unburdened (often used to describe a cathartic release)
- 痛 (tòng): pain
- 快 (kuai): fast, relieving
- 地 (de): adverbial particle
- 哭出 (kū chū): to cry out
- 哭 (kū): cry
- 出 (chū): out
- 声音 (shēng yīn): sound, voice
- 声 (shēng): sound
- 音 (yīn): tone
我可以抱你吗 宝贝:
The phrase '我可以抱你吗 宝贝' (wǒ kě yǐ bào nǐ ma bǎo bèi) means 'Can I hold you, baby?'

Breakdown:
- 我 (wǒ): I
- 可以 (kě yǐ): can, may
- 可 (kě): can
- 以 (yǐ): be able to
- 抱 (bào): to hold, embrace
- 你 (nǐ): you
- 吗 (ma): question particle
- 宝贝 (bǎo bèi): baby, darling
- 宝 (bǎo): treasure
- 贝 (bèi): shell (symbolizing something precious)
让我最后一次这样叫你:
The phrase '让我最后一次这样叫你' (ràng wǒ zuì hòu yī cì zhè yàng jiào nǐ) means 'Let me call you like this one last time.'

Breakdown:
- 让 (ràng): let, allow
- 我 (wǒ): me
- 最后一次 (zuì hòu yī cì): one last time
- 最后 (zuì hòu): last, final
- 最 (zuì): most, last
- 后 (hòu): after
- 一次 (yī cì): one time
- 一 (yī): one
- 次 (cì): time, occurrence
- 这样 (zhè yàng): in this way
- 这 (zhè): this
- 样 (yàng): manner, way
- 叫 (jiào): to call, address
- 你 (nǐ): you
你也不得已:
The phrase '你也不得已' (nǐ yě bù dé yǐ) means 'you too have no choice.'

Breakdown:
- 你 (nǐ): you
- 也 (yě): also
- 不得已 (bù dé yǐ): have no alternative or choice
- 不 (bù): not
- 得 (dé): obtain, get
- 以 (yǐ): means or method
我会笑笑地离去:
The phrase '我会笑笑地离去' (wǒ huì xiào xiào de lí qù) means 'I will leave with a gentle smile.'

Breakdown:
- 我 (wǒ): I
- 会 (huì): will
- 笑笑地 (xiào xiào de): with a light, gentle smile
- 笑 (xiào): to smile or laugh
- 笑 (xiào): repeated for a gentle tone
- 地 (de): adverbial particle
- 离去 (lí qù): to leave, depart
- 离 (lí): to leave
- 去 (qù): go
外面下着雨:
The phrase '外面下着雨' (wài miàn xià zhe yǔ) means 'it is raining outside.'

Breakdown:
- 外面 (wài miàn): outside
- 外 (wài): outside
- 面 (miàn): area, surface
- 下着 (xià zhe): is falling (continuous form)
- 下 (xià): to fall
- 着 (zhe): particle indicating ongoing action
- 雨 (yǔ): rain
